column4: hi, i installed the English-arabic and arabic-english dictionary packages dict-freedict-eng-ara, dict-freedict-ara-eng. how i can use them ?
Go to System -> Administration -> Language Support and enable the languages you want to be able to use. At the login screen there is an option to change the language you wish to you use.
i don't want to change the Interface language i want to get a dictionary for Arabic-English
ok sorry, I never have done just the dictionary before.
